description: Detects the import of an alternate data stream with regini.exe, regini.exe can be used to modify registry keys.
author: Eli Salem
Sander Wiebing
oscd.community
name: Modifies the Registry From a ADS
query: (((process.executable.text:*\\regini.exe) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"REGINI.EXE")) AND (process.command_line.text:/:/ OR process.command_line.text:/[/ OR process.command_line.text:/^/ OR process.command_line.text:/ / OR process.command_line.text:/\/ OR process.command_line.text:/\/ OR process.command_line.text:/]/))
